definition: Foshan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]

mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Our factory is located in the "hardware village, " said Sands, Nanhai District, Foshan City.
sentences.chinese: 本廠位於有“五金之鄉”之稱的佛山市南海區金沙。

sentences.english: China Building Ceramic Capital is located in Foshan City, Guangdong Province, the famous ceramic production enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 地處中國建陶之都廣東省佛山市，著名陶瓷生產企業。

sentences.english: Yosin Hardware Co. , Ltd is located in Nanhai District Foshan City Guangdong Province in China.
sentences.chinese: 友信五金有限公司，位於交通發達的佛山市南海區。

sentences.english: Another place you must go in Foshan is the old porcelain furnace in Shi Wan.
sentences.chinese: 另一處地方，你一定要在佛山市是老瓷爐在史萬。

sentences.english: Industry is the key to the economic development of Foshan municipality.
sentences.chinese: 工業是佛山市直經濟發展的主體。

sentences.english: Gaoming Ecological Park is located in Gaoming District, Foshan City, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 高明盈香生態園位於廣東省佛山市高明區。

sentences.english: It is located in shunde district, foshan, rich Ann industrial park.
sentences.chinese: 它座落在佛山市順德區富安工業園。

sentences.english: Officials there say they are one of 40 lingerie firms in the city of Foshan.
sentences.chinese: 官方統計在佛山市有40個內衣生產公司。

sentences.english: Foshan Shunde Yinfeng Glass Mechanism Co. , Ltd. Glass Technics Branch Co.
sentences.chinese: 佛山市順德區銀鋒玻璃機械有限公司玻璃工藝分公司。

sentences.english: The girl from Foshan, Guangdong province, died days later in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 這名來自廣東省佛山市的小女孩，幾天後在醫院去世。
